name: Djinni Spin
prerequisiteFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:djinni_style OR @feat:djinni_spirit OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)
descriptionText: You can surround yourself with the power of the storm, spinning like a hurricane to unleash a violent blast of electrical energy.
